TopicTitle: Random Detonation of space craft while using Mk 1-2 command pod

Articles.Content:
Hey guys I'm having a problem with the command pod in the title, it flies completely fine up until it reaches 6km altitude when the whole space craft is randomly destroyed.

when I load up the flight report it says everything has crashed into "obj_base".

This only occurs when using the Mk 1-2 command pod and is driving me nuts, if anyone has any idea how to fix the problem could they please let me know because I'm out of ideas XD
Post a screenshot of your craft, and the flight report. And it might because your engines are overheating. What part explodes first upon detonation?
